sentences.en: As often as not, we attempted to elude her, but to no avail.
sentences.cn: 我们常常试着避开她, 但都不起作用.

sentences.en: But Sir Walter Elliot has eyes upon him which it may be very difficult to elude.
sentences.cn: 不过别人的眼睛总是盯着他沃尔特·埃利奥特爵士,想躲也躲不开.

sentences.en: He bets he can stay alive for 24 hours, then comes to Cleveland to elude them.
sentences.cn: 他打赌说自己能活过24小时, 就来到克利夫兰躲开他们.

sentences.en: He eluded his pursuers by escaping into a river.
sentences.cn: 他逃到河里，甩掉了追踪他的人。

sentences.en: I had dared and baffled his fury; I must elude his sorrow.
sentences.cn: 我曾经面对过他的愤怒,并且把它挫败了; 现在我必须躲避他的悲哀.

sentences.en: If you chase it, it will elude you.
sentences.cn: 如果你追逐着它, 它会躲避你.

sentences.en: It can elude authors like Kerouac and Barth for widely different reasons.
sentences.cn: 它可以躲避的广泛不同的因素,如作者凯鲁亚克和巴斯.

sentences.en: It is those we live with and love and should know who elude us.
sentences.cn: 那些和我们一起生活着的,我们爱着的人,应当知道谁在回避着我们.

sentences.en: Lest I should not prize you, you elude me in a thousand ways.
sentences.cn: 只恐我不珍爱你, 你千方百计地闪避我.

sentences.en: New Ability to remove challenging new threats designed to elude elimination.
sentences.cn: 新增:能够移除采取规避删除设计的挑衅性新型威胁.

sentences.en: The Cover of Darkness can be used to elude your enemies.
sentences.cn: 黑暗天幕可以用来躲避敌人.
那只狐狸躲避那一群狗.

sentences.en: The thief eluded the police; This difficult idea seems to elude me.
sentences.cn: 小偷躲避了警察; 这个难题看起来躲避了我.

sentences.en: The two men managed to elude the police for six weeks.
sentences.cn: 这两个男人想方设法逃避警方追捕达六个星期。

sentences.en: To conceal traces so as to elude pursuers.
sentences.cn: 灭迹掩盖痕迹以甩掉追踪者.

sentences.en: We struggle and bumble our way along, but somehow happiness continues to elude us.
sentences.cn: 我们独自努力摸索着, 但是不知道怎么了幸福还是在躲避着我们.

words.tran_cn: 难懂的；易忘的；逃避的；难捉摸的
狡诈；易闪避；飘忽不定；巧妙逃避

trans.tran_en: to escape from someone or something, especially by tricking them

trans.tran_cn: 逃避，使…迷惑，理解不了，抓不到
